Package com.example.networkmeup.view.Login.LoginEmployee

Interface LoginEmployeeView

All Known Implementing Classes:
LoginEmployeeActivity, LoginEmployeeViewStub
public interface LoginEmployeeView
This interface defines the contract for the view responsible for Employee Login functionality. It provides methods to retrieve login credentials, display error messages, and indicate a successful login attempt.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Email
    getEmail()
    Retrieves the email input from the user for login.
    Password
    getPassword()
    Retrieves the password input from the user for login.
    void
    showErrorMessage(String title, String message)
    Displays an error message on the login screen.
    void
    successfullyFinishLogin(String userToken)
    Indicates a successful login attempt and triggers navigation to the next screen.

  • Method Details

    • getEmail

      Email getEmail() throws RuntimeException
      Retrieves the email input from the user for login.
      Returns:
      An Email object containing the entered email address.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there's an issue acquiring the email.

    • getPassword

      Password getPassword() throws RuntimeException
      Retrieves the password input from the user for login.
      Returns:
      A Password object containing the entered password.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there's an issue acquiring the password.

    • showErrorMessage

      void showErrorMessage(String title, String message)
      Displays an error message on the login screen.
      Parameters:
      title - The title for the error message dialog.
      message - The error message to be displayed.

    • successfullyFinishLogin

      void successfullyFinishLogin(String userToken)
      Indicates a successful login attempt and triggers navigation to the next screen.
      Parameters:
      userToken - token passed for user indexing for later pages.
